Ramhorn:


Ramhorn watched the photon grenade land on the ground. 
"Oh, slag." he said, turning, raising his sub-machine gun at Zenyak.  About 
to pull the trigger, the grenade exploded, sending shrapnel cutting into the 
back of Ramhorn's head, legs, feet, buttocks, and his back, the actual force 
of the explosion sending him flying through the air 20 feet, sending him 
slamming to the ground.  Rolling from his abdomen to the ground to back to 
the ground he slowly shook his head, barely staying conscious.
"N...not my week."
